content: hello actually i designed this mandala last year but no name yet and after i get from umrah i just get the idea so i named it with marwah it is very easy and fun to make and it is suitable for you who are beginner in crocheting you can use any kind of yarn according to the result you want you can use only 1 color or combo it is up to you finally dont forget to tag me on social media when you post your making thank you love t
